title: S12 Ep113: LEGENDS: Uncovering Dark Histories of  Vampires, Witches, Ghosts & More in America
itunes:title: LEGENDS: Uncovering Dark Histories of  Vampires, Witches, Ghosts & More in America
description:
Jeff Belanger, is the host of the hit AMAZON PRIME 5 Part Series, New England Legends & lead researcher for Travel Channels Ghost Adventures TV series. Jeff reveals some of the more freakish legends surrounding our historic beginnings in America.

Jeff Belanger: https://www.amazon.com/The-Spooky-Berkshires/dp/B072JZ6GXM/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1498531806&sr=8-1&keywords=new%20england%20legends
